welcome_message_body: Welcome to Borre, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and rich history. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Moss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo operations, handling both domestic and international shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sandefjord Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Sandefjord Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
